nav.div: Dolgeville » District » Coronavirus (COVID-19) Information » COVID-19 Emotional Support

div.span:
Governor Andrew M. Cuomo announced a new helpline for people who are experiencing anxiety, stress and depression during the coronavirus emergency.
Call now for free and confidential support.
1-844-863-9314
8:00 AM - 10:00 PM
7 days a week
Mental Health Resources During an Emergency [Link]
